name: air-lock

effect.sun_moon: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to cloud nine.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to cloud nine.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects. This ability functions identically to cloud nine.

short_effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.
